entry.title: trevorjay/Bondis-Heaps-of-Air
entry.summary:
Parenscript source code for "Bondi's Heaps of Air", an endless runner for mobile web browsers.

Bondi's Heaps of Air

Game

"Bondi's Heaps of Air" is an endless surfing game intended to be played on mobile devices using motion controls. You can play the game here via Newgrounds.

Source Code

The game is written in Parenscript, a Lisp-like syntax for Javascript, but otherwise depends on no libraries or frameworks.

License

The source code is made available here under a Creative Commons license (see the license file). The copyright for all game art and music is either held separately (see the credits section on the Newgrounds page) or reserved.
